backend/main.mo: Core backend actor defining user profiles, game state, rooms, and access-controlled APIs for a multiplayer snake-like game.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for project tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the functionality of numerous frontend game-related files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the Hill Climb app with metadata, icons, and manifest.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Instructions for packaging the Snake Game PWA as an Android app using TWA and submitting it to Google Play.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: TWA asset links file mapping the PWA to its Android app package and certificate fingerprint.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, theme, metadata, and startup parameters for Hill Climb.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing static asset caching and cache version cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component initializing the service worker and rendering HillClimbApp with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Defines animation timing constants and a helper to wait asynchronously.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps game asset paths and provides a helper for candy sprite positioning.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a basic audio manager for loading, playing, and muting sound effects with placeholder sounds.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Exports convenience functions to trigger specific game sound effects.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial and refill boards with random candies while avoiding immediate matches.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles the board until at least one legal move exists.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: Component rendering a candy tile with sprite selection, special candy handling, and interaction events.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the match-3 grid, handling touch and mouse interactions to select, highlight, and attempt swaps while reflecting animation states.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game UI combining HUD, board, audio controls, and overlays for game over and level completion.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to make candies fall and returns fall information.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Defines helpers for checking adjacency, position validity, and directional movement.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Detects if the board contains any legal move by testing potential swaps.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Finds horizontal and vertical matches and checks if a swap would create one.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Provides simple game-over and level-complete overlay components with icons and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Provides level configuration and checks if the player met the target score.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, handles special candy creation and activations, applies clearing logic, and computes score gains.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Calculates scoring for clears and defines level target score and initial moves.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes target cells for each special candy type and detects striped+striped combo effects.
frontend/src/game/specialCandyRules.ts: Determines which special candy to create from matches and applies creation to the board.
frontend/src/game/touchControls.ts: Detects swipe direction based on touch start and end positions.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines core Match‑3 game constants, board types, candy types, and game/animation state structures.
frontend/src/game/useMatch3Game.ts: Main hook managing Match‑3 game state, level flow, input handling, animations, and cascade resolution.
frontend/src/hillclimb/assets.ts: Provides file paths for Hill Climb UI, stage, vehicle, and gallery image assets.
frontend/src/hillclimb/daily/dailyChalle: Generates deterministic daily challenges and checks claim/completion state.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/failures.t: Evaluates vehicle flip and crash conditions based on rotation, speed, and ground contact.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/fuel.ts: Implements fuel system creation, depletion, and refueling logic.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/hazards.ts: Spawns hazards, updates their lifecycle, and detects collisions with the vehicle.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/input.ts: Defines basic throttle/brake input state and returns default neutral input.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/physics.ts: Provides 2D vector operations and simple integration utilities.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/pickups.ts: Spawns fuel/coin pickups, removes old ones, and detects collection for scoring and refueling.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/renderer.t: Renders each frame by drawing terrain, pickups, hazards, and the vehicle with a camera following the car.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/scoring.ts: Updates distance, coin rewards, and stunt points based on vehicle movement and stunt state.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/stunts.ts: Tracks airborne state, airtime, and resets stunt data upon landing.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/terrain.ts: Defines terrain config and sampling functions using simple multi‑octave noise and normal calculation.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/useFixedTi: Runs a fixed‑timestep game loop using requestAnimationFrame and an accumulator.
frontend/src/hillclimb/engine/vehicle.ts: Updates vehicle physics including gravity, suspension, drive forces, rotation alignment, and speed clamping.
frontend/src/hillclimb/HillClimbApp.tsx: Top‑level Hill Climb app component controlling screen navigation and persistent game state updates.
frontend/src/hillclimb/progression/stora: Loads and saves persistent game progression, ensuring photo‑1 is always unlocked.
frontend/src/hillclimb/progression/upgra: Defines upgrade configs, cost logic, and applies stat modifiers to vehicle base stats.
frontend/src/hillclimb/progression/vehic: Provides vehicle configurations with stats and unlock costs and a lookup function by ID.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/DailyChal: UI screen showing the daily challenge, completion state, and reward claim button.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/GameplayS: Main gameplay component initializing systems, running the game loop, and handling physics, scoring, fuel, pickups, and hazards.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/GarageScr: UI for selecting vehicles and purchasing upgrades, handling unlocks, affordability checks, and cloud sync panel integration.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/MainMenuS: Main menu showing logo and navigation buttons for starting a run, garage, gallery, and daily challenge.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/PhotoGall: Displays a grid of photos with unlock logic, viewing modal, and coin‑based purchase flow.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/ResultsSc: Shows run results including distance, coins, stunt points, and provides actions to replay or return to menu.
frontend/src/hillclimb/screens/StageSele: Presents a list of stages with previews; selecting a card triggers stage selection callback.
frontend/src/hillclimb/stages/stages.ts: Defines stage data including terrain, hazards, and physics, and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/hillclimb/ui/AuthAndSyncPan: Login and cloud sync panel handling Internet Identity auth, profile creation, and saving/loading game state.
Renders throttle and brake buttons with pointer handling and safety cleanup on visibility or blur.
frontend/src/hillclimb/ui/Hud.tsx: Displays distance, coins, and fuel using themed HUD layout and a progress bar.
frontend/src/hillclimb/ui/Overlay.tsx: Wraps children in a centered card overlay for modal UI elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Provides utilities to check, enter, exit, and toggle fullscreen mode with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries and mutations for room existence, creation, and state polling using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, theme variables, and layout classes for the Hill Climb UI using Tailwind.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, InternetIdentityProvider, and React Query.
frontend/src/snake/DPad.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/snake/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick with pointer tracking, clamped thumb movement, and steering filtering to emit angle changes.
frontend/src/snake/joystickSteeringFilte: Implements joystick angle filtering with deadzone, smoothing, and hysteresis to produce stable steering output.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Defines core Snake game world constants and utility functions and initializes player, AI snakes, and pickups.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/Multiplay: UI screen showing connection, reconnection, or failure states with retry and leave actions.
Displays reconnecting or disconnected status indicators during multiplayer sessions.
Renders a leaderboard panel showing top-scoring snakes and highlighting the local player.
Panel displaying the multiplayer room code with clipboard copy support and error handling.
Context provider managing multiplayer room creation, joining, leaving, and related state and errors.
Canvas renderer for multiplayer snake, drawing background, snakes, pickups, and handling camera/viewport transforms.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/types.ts: Type definitions for multiplayer snakes, game state, and room metadata.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/urlRoomCo: Utility functions to read, write, clear, and build room-code URLs for multiplayer invites.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useInputS: Hook that periodically submits the player's angle input to the backend when enabled.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useMultip: Thin wrapper hook exposing shared multiplayer room context.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useNickna: Hook managing nickname state with validation and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useRoomPo: Polling hook fetching multiplayer room state, tracking failures, and reporting connection status.
frontend/src/snake/pickupSprites.ts: Defines food sprite sheet layout and helpers for selecting food sprites and pickup render sizes.
frontend/src/snake/RotateToLandscapeOver: Full‑screen overlay prompting users to rotate their device to landscape when visible.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeBoosters.tsx: Renders three disabled booster buttons with icons and counts using WZ asset sprites.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer for the snake game that draws the world, player, AI, background tiles, and pickups with DPR scaling and camera following.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMainMenu.tsx: Main menu UI for single‑player and multiplayer, handling nickname input, room creation/joining, and invite URL copying.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMinimap.tsx: Draws a minimap showing player, AI snake positions, and the current viewport rectangle.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMissionCompleteO: Overlay displayed when a mission completes, showing a celebratory panel.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: Provides pause and game‑over overlays with action buttons and basic stats.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Main Snake game screen managing single-player and multiplayer modes, input handling, overlays, and viewport state.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Core types for single‑player snake game state, entities, pickups, missions, and world data.
frontend/src/snake/useCanvasViewport.ts: Hook computing responsive canvas viewport dimensions with DPR handling and resize stabilization.
frontend/src/snake/useLandscapeOrientati: Hook that tracks and updates whether the device is in landscape orientation.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: Main single‑player game loop hook handling snake movement, missions, AI, pickups, and timing.
frontend/src/snake/wzAssets.ts: Central mapping of asset paths for backgrounds, UI, boosters, and pickups.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving them with persistence, and removing parameters from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including summary, issues, required images, and implemented feature records.
